Introduction

Yerin is a South Korean singer-songwriter under Bill Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group GFRIEND and the pre-debut team i-Teen.

She debuted as a member of GFriend with the EP Season of Glass on January 15, 2015.

GFRIEND disbanded on May 22, 2021, after all members left Source Music upon the completion of their six-year contract.

In June 2021, Yerin signed with Sublime Artist Agency. On March 31, 2023, SUBLIME released a statement announcing Yerin's departure from the agency after her contract with them had expired and decided not to renew.

On April 14, 2023, she signed an exclusive contract with Bill Entertainment.

Fun facts

1
On August 24, 2019 Yerin sent Red Velvet's Joy & Apink's Hayoung a food support truck for their Music Core performances (Red Velvet's comeback & Hayoungs solo debut). Her message to them said "Congrats my young-youngies on debut, and comeback~ I love you"
…
2
Yerin's special talent is drinking lots of water in one go. In "The Gifted", Yerin drank 1 liter of water in one go.
